languages.english-overview:
PopojiCMS is one of the content management system created with a simple concept to facilitate each individual to manage the website. With the concept of joint and native php oop, ordinary web developers can quickly understand the structure of the engine PopojiCMS.
PopojiCMS just use it as OOP PHP for processing the data to the database. It aims for novice web developers can freely create develop websites. Hopefully PopojiCMS can answer all your needs on the web.
PopojiCMS is released under the MIT License.
